title: [M-01] Failure in `sendNFTs()` leaves NFTs stuck and causes asset loss
summary: The bug report is about an issue in the `CardAllocationPool` contract where randomly selected cards are getting stuck and cannot be used again. This happens when the `sendNFTs` function fails to transfer the selected cards to the owner. The problem is that there is no mechanism in place to re-add these cards or allow the redeem manager to recover them. This also causes physical items associated with these cards to become permanently unredeemable. The report recommends implementing a mechanism to re-add the stuck cards or allowing the redeem manager to recover them.
